players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie's death is tragic. As the only kill, it suggests the mafia is trying to blend in. We should look for who is acting overly helpful or shifting blame."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. We must vote for Diana to win."
Bob: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows she is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote Alice."

Alice: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. We must vote for Diana to win."
You: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows she is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
